name: Productboard <> GitLab integration
description: A sample GitLab integration using Node.js app and Express

GITLAB_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying your GitLab access.

PB_INTEGRATION_ID.description: The ID of your Productboard plugin integration. Located in the response of the POST request in Postman.

PB_TOKEN.description: Your Productboard API token located in the Integration settings.

GITLAB_PROJECT_ID.description: The ID of your GitLab project that you want Productboard features pushed to.
